title: Workshop on Effective Education-Research Collaboration Strategies in Science Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Methodologies in Scientific Research and Education
context.additional_context: Strengthening Collaboration Skills Between Science Field Practitioners and Students Through Informal Short-Term Workshops Using Digital Devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain the purposes of using three or more science education/research collaboration tools through 20-minute sessions
Learners can develop implementation plans to apply at least one learned tool to actual projects within one week after workshop completion
Learners can propose methods to improve digital tool utilization efficiency by 20% or more when collaborating with peer practitioners/students
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
